# Show build dependencies for brave-browser
# requires source code or deb-src in packages.lists
apt-get source brave-browser
cd brave-browser-*
cat debian/control | grep Build-Depends

# when compiling from source
sudo apt-get build-dep brave-browser


# Install the package
apt-get update && apt-get install -y brave-browser

# Show package dependencies
apt-cache depends brave-browser

# List installed files for the package
dpkg -L brave-browser


# shared libs
ldd /usr/bin/brave-browser
